trans-unit.source: Represents a panel in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示中的一个面板<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref> control replaces and adds functionality to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> control of previous versions, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.
trans-unit.target: 尽管<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref>控件替换，并将功能添加到<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref>的早期版本中，控件<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref>可以选择保留向后兼容性和将来使用。

trans-unit.source: A StatusBarPanel represents an individual panel in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: StatusBarPanel 表示中的单个面板<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>

trans-unit.source: A StatusBarPanel can contain text and/or an icon that can be used to reflect the status of an application.
trans-unit.target: StatusBarPanel 可以包含文本和/或可用于反映应用程序的状态的图标。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>, accessible through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control, to retrieve, add, or remove an individual StatusBarPanel.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>，可通过访问<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>控制，用于以检索、 添加或删除单个 StatusBarPanel。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>

trans-unit.source: The StatusBarPanel provides properties that enable you to modify the display behavior of a panel within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: StatusBarPanel 提供使你能够修改中的面板的显示方式的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A> property to display an icon within a panel.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A>属性，以显示一个面板中的图标。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to provide a graphical representation of state in an application.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可以用于提供的图形表示形式在应用程序的状态。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A> property enables you to specify how text and/or an icon is aligned within the panel.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A>属性使您能够指定文本和/或一个图标在面板内的对齐方式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: To ensure that your panel is sized properly to fit the text of the panel, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> property to automatically resize the panel to fit the text of the panel or to fill the remaining space within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保，你面板的大小以适合面板的文本，可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>属性自动调整大小以适合面板的文本，或以填充剩余的面板空间内<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A> property enables you to specify a minimum width for the panel to ensure that it does not get smaller than the data it is intended to display.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A>属性使您能够指定要确保它不会小于它旨在显示的数据的面板的最小宽度。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control is typically used to display Help information or state information about your application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>控件通常用于显示帮助信息或有关你的应用程序的状态信息。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: Often, it is important to display additional information about data that is presented in a panel.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，务必在面板中显示有关显示的数据的其他信息。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A> property to display information whenever the mouse pointer rests on a panel.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A>属性时在鼠标指针停放在面板上显示信息。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A>

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control is typically used to display textual information, you can also provide your own type of display to a StatusBarPanel.
trans-unit.target: 尽管<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>控件通常用于显示文本的信息，还可向 StatusBarPanel 提供您自己的显示类型。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A> property enables you to specify how the StatusBarPanel will be drawn.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A>属性使您能够指定将如何绘制 StatusBarPanel。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A> property is used to display the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A> property (and an icon, if specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A> property).
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A>属性用于显示的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A>属性 (一个图标，如果在指定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A>属性)。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle>, you can draw your own information into the panel.
trans-unit.target: 如果该属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle>，到面板，可以绘制你自己的信息。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle>

trans-unit.source: You can use this feature to draw a progress bar or an animated icon in the panel.
trans-unit.target: 此功能可用于在面板上绘制一个进度栏或一个动画的图标。

trans-unit.source: When you create an instance of the StatusBarPanel class, the read/write properties are set to initial values.
trans-unit.target: 当你创建 StatusBarPanel 类的实例时，读/写属性设置为初始值。

trans-unit.source: For a list of these values, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 有关这些值的列表，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: When you create an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, the following read/write properties are set to initial values.
trans-unit.target: 当你创建的实例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>，以下的读/写属性设置为初始值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A>|10| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A>|A zero-length string.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A>|A zero-length string.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Width%2A>|100| You can change the value for any of these properties through a separate call to the property.
trans-unit.target: |属性 |初始值 | |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A>|&10; | |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A>|零长度字符串。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A>|零长度字符串。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Width%2A>|&100; | 你可以更改任何通过单独属性调用这些属性的值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment of text and icons within the status bar panel.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置文本和图标状态栏面板内的对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to horizontally align the text and/or icon assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A> property within the borders of the panel.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此属性水平对齐文本和/或图标分配给<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A>在面板的边框内的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A>

trans-unit.source: Text and icons can be aligned to the left, right, or center of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 文本和图标可以对齐到左、 右或的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>中心

trans-unit.source: There is no way to independently position an icon within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 没有方法可以独立放置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>中的图标

trans-unit.source: For example, you cannot position an icon to the left side of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> while aligning the text on the right side.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您不能放置到左侧的图标<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>对齐右侧的文本时。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: The icon is always positioned to the left side of the text regardless of how the text is aligned.
trans-unit.target: 无论中文本的对齐文本的左侧始终位于图标。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value assigned to the property is not a member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 分配给属性的值不是成员的<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"></xref>枚举。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the status bar panel is automatically resized.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否自动调整状态栏面板的大小。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> have precedence over those panels set to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>对象设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>通过设置为这些面板具有优先级<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize></xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> that has its AutoSize property set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> is shortened if a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> with the AutoSize property set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> requires that space.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>具有其 AutoSize 属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>如果缩短<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>AutoSize 属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>需要该空间。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: You can use AutoSize to ensure that the contents of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> are properly displayed in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control that contains more than one panel.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用自动调整大小以确保内容<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>正确地显示在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>包含多个面板的控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might want a panel that contains text to adjust automatically to the amount of text it is displaying (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>), while another panel on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> that displays an owner-drawn progress bar would need to be a fixed size (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>).
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可能想包含要与它显示的文本量会自动调整文本的面板 (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>)，而另一个面板<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>一个所有者描述的进度栏将需要是固定的大小以显示 (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>)。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value assigned to the property is not a member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 分配给属性的值不是成员的<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize"></xref>枚举。

trans-unit.source: Begins the initialization of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 开始初始化<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to start the initialization of a component that is used on a form or used by another component.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于启动窗体上使用或由另一个组件的组件的初始化。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.EndInit%2A> method ends the initialization.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.EndInit%2A>方法初始化已结束。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.EndInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Using the BeginInit and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.EndInit%2A> methods prevents the control from being used before it is fully initialized.
trans-unit.target: 使用 BeginInit 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.EndInit%2A>方法阻止控件完全初始化之前使用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.EndInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style of the status bar panel.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置状态栏面板的边框样式。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to differentiate a panel from other panels in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此属性来区分从其他面板中的一个面板<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value assigned to the property is not a member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 分配给属性的值不是成员的<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle"></xref>枚举。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 释放由非托管的资源<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref> ，还可以释放托管的资源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法称为由公共`Dispose()`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> references.
trans-unit.target: 当`disposing`参数是`true`，此方法释放由任何托管对象持有的全部资源此<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>引用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用`Dispose()`每个引用对象的方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要释放托管和非托管资源;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>若要仅释放非托管的资源。

trans-unit.source: Ends the initialization of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化已结束<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to end the initialization of a component that is used by another component.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于结束的初始化由另一个组件的组件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BeginInit%2A> method starts the initialization.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BeginInit%2A>方法开始初始化。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BeginInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BeginInit%2A> and EndInit methods prevents the control from being used before it is fully initialized.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BeginInit%2A>和 EndInit 方法阻止控件完全初始化之前使用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BeginInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the icon to display within the status bar panel.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要在状态栏面板中显示的图标。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to display an icon that represents the state of your application or a process within your application.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可用于显示一个图标表示你的应用程序或你的应用程序内的进程的状态。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can display an icon in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> to indicate whether a file save operation is in progress or complete.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以显示中的图标<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>指出保存操作的文件是否正在进行或已完成。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > There is no way to independently position an icon within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 没有方法可以独立放置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>中的图标

trans-unit.source: For example, you cannot position an icon to the left side of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> while aligning the text on the right side using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您不能放置到左侧的图标<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>对齐上右侧使用的文本时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: The icon is always positioned to the left side of the panel's text regardless of how the text is aligned.
trans-unit.target: 无论文本的对齐方式的面板的文本的左侧始终位于图标。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"></xref> that represents the icon to display in the panel.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"> </xref> ，它表示要在面板中显示的图标。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum allowed width of the status bar panel within the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置允许在状态栏面板的宽度的最小<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The MinWidth property is used when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> to prevent the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> from automatically resizing to a width that is too small.
trans-unit.target: 使用 MinWidth 属性时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>以防止<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>从自动调整大小太小的宽度。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>, the MinWidth property is automatically set to the same value as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Width%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>，MinWidth 属性自动设置为相同的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Width%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The minimum width, in pixels, of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 最小宽度，以像素为单位的<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A value less than 0 is assigned to the property.
trans-unit.target: 小于 0 的值被分配给属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name to apply to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要应用于名称<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The Name property corresponds to the key for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Name 属性对应于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection></xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>密钥

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 名称<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> control that hosts the status bar panel.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref>承载状态栏面板的控件。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to determine the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> is contained within.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此属性来确定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>中包含。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects are added to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>对象添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>控件，通过调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A>方法的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>类。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar></xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control is accessible through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>控件是可通过访问<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> that contains the panel.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref> ，该字符串包含面板。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style of the status bar panel.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置状态栏面板的样式。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to indicate whether a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> displays text or whether the panel is managed as an owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此属性以指示是否<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>显示文本或是否为所有者描述<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>管理面板</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: To determine when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> needs to be drawn, create an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>需要创建的事件处理程序、 绘制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem>事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs> passed as a parameter to an event handler of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> event enables you to determine which panel needs to be drawn.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs>作为参数传递给事件处理程序的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem>事件使您能够确定哪个面板需要绘制。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs> also provides a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object you can use to perform drawing tasks on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs>还提供了<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>可用于执行的时间为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>绘制任务的对象</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value assigned to the property is not a member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 分配给属性的值不是成员的<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle"></xref>枚举。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that contains data about the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置包含有关数据的对象<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that contains data about the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>，其中包含有关数据<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text of the status bar panel.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置状态栏面板的文本。

trans-unit.source: This property represents the text that is displayed when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性表示的文本时，所显示的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to display information about your application in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此属性显示关于你的应用程序中的信息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use the Text property to display Help information when the user moves the mouse over a menu or to display the name and location of a file that is opened in an application.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以使用文本属性来显示帮助信息，当用户将鼠标移到菜单上，或若要显示的名称和应用程序中打开的文件的位置。

trans-unit.source: To align the text within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要对齐文本<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: The text displayed in the panel.
trans-unit.target: 在面板中显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets ToolTip text associated with the status bar panel.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置状态栏面板与关联的工具提示文本。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to display additional information in a ToolTip when the mouse pointer rests on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此属性以工具提示中显示其他信息，当鼠标指针停留的时间为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>时

trans-unit.source: For example, you can display a ToolTip that provides data transfer speed for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> that displays the status of a file transfer.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以显示工具提示提供数据的传输速度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>显示的文件传输的状态。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: To display ToolTips for other controls in your application, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要显示有关你的应用程序中的其他控件的工具提示，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: The ToolTip text for the panel.
trans-unit.target: 面板工具提示文本。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a string that contains information about the panel.
trans-unit.target: 检索一个字符串，包含有关面板的信息。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that contains the class name for the control and the text it contains.
trans-unit.target: 返回包含它所包含的文本和控件的类名称的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of the status bar panel within the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在状态栏面板的宽度<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The Width property always reflects the actual width of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> and cannot be smaller than the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 宽度属性始终反映的实际宽度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>，并且不能小于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: To automatically resize the width of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> to the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 自动调整大小的宽度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>内容的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>，你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 宽度，以像素为单位的<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The width specified is less than the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth*> property.
trans-unit.target: 指定的宽度小于的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth*>
